ohlohj.apis
インタフェース AccountMethods

既知のサブインタフェースの一覧:
OhlohAPI
既知の実装クラスの一覧:
OhlohAPIImpl
public interface AccountMethods

作成者:
cloudysunny14

メソッドの概要
 Account createAccount(long accountId)
          Account returns from AcocuntID.
 Account createAccountWithEmail(String email)
          Account returns from e-mail address.
 ResponseList<Account> createAccountWithQuery(CollectionParameter parameter)
          Account list returns from query objects.
 

メソッドの詳細

createAccount

Account createAccount(long accountId)
                      throws OhlohException
Account returns from AcocuntID. To get a single Account:

パラメータ:
accountId - the userID
戻り値:
the Account object
例外:
OhlohException - when network(Service) is unavailable
関連項目:
Account

createAccountWithEmail

Account createAccountWithEmail(String email)
                               throws OhlohException
Account returns from e-mail address. using the MD5 hash of the account’s email address You can also retrieve an Account using the MD5 hash of the email address, if you know it:

パラメータ:
email - the account's email address
戻り値:
the Account object
例外:
OhlohException - when network(Service) is unavailable
関連項目:
Account

createAccountWithQuery

ResponseList<Account> createAccountWithQuery(CollectionParameter parameter)
                                             throws OhlohException
Account list returns from query objects. To get a list of all Accounts The account collection method supports the standard collection request parameters

パラメータ:
parameter - the CollectionParameter
戻り値:
the ResponseList object
例外:
OhlohException - when network(Service) is unavailable
関連項目:
Account
